mosinstall.name: ks-AddPhp
mosinstall.author: Kostas Stathopoulos
mosinstall.description:
This bot will include a php file inside content.

Usage: {addphp file=realtive_path_to_file_in_elxisdir_include_file_name}

Note: Adding php files inside elxis must be used by experienced users only.
Avoid using ks-addphp bot if you are not knowing what are you doing!
